description.part1: I am a software engineer with experience in backend, DevOps, frontend, and developing mobile and web applications. I have worked on projects integrating computer vision, IoT, ERP, and cloud architectures. I have experience with projects in Brazil and abroad. On the backend, I have developed solutions for system integrations and infrastructure creation, both locally and in the cloud (AWS). On the frontend, I have worked on web, mobile, and embedded applications, aiming to deliver clear and functional interfaces.
description.part2: I have participated in B2B and B2C projects, dealing with API integration, CI/CD pipeline implementation, and process optimization. I enjoy working in multidisciplinary teams and seek to use appropriate technologies to solve each project's problems.
description.part3: I am motivated by challenges involving technological innovation, systems architecture, and real business impact.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on. Click on the project title to see more details.

sigiloMobile.title: Sigilo Mobile
sigiloMobile.description: A fast and cross-platform mobile application built with Flutter and Clean Architecture (BLoC). It uses caching for performance and provides fuel station managers with critical business information, helping them make better decisions.

kindraTrack.title: Kindra Track
kindraTrack.description: Kindra Track is an innovative web platform that enables complete monitoring of animal shipments such as pigs, fish, cattle, and chickens. Integrated with an embedded system using computer vision and sensors, the platform receives real-time loading information directly from farms.
kindraTrack.description2: Additionally, Kindra Track includes a mobile app that synchronizes this data, allowing managers to:
kindraTrack.description3: 1. Monitor the status of shipments and animals in their facilities.
kindraTrack.description4: 2. Receive automatic notifications of counting discrepancies, ensuring logistical accuracy.
kindraTrack.description5: 3. Obtain detailed weekly reports with analyses of shipments that presented discrepancies compared to the values reported in the GTA (Animal Transfer Guide), providing greater transparency and operational control.

ww4.title: WW 4.0
ww4.description: WOOD WORK 4.0 is an internal web platform developed to enable complete digitalization and intelligent tracking of manufacturing processes in the carpentry and furniture production sector. The project is a collaboration between NKA – New Knowledge Advice, the Polytechnic Institute of Bragança (IPB), and CeDRI – Research Center in Digitalization and Intelligent Robotics. The platform replaces traditional paper-based workflows with a centralized digital application, optimizing daily operations on the shop floor. It integrates data analysis and computer vision to automate the capture, classification, and management of production data.

vamo.title: Vamo.com.vc
vamo.description: Vamo.com.vc is a modern flight search and booking platform that integrates multiple airline APIs to deliver real-time results, uses parallel searches for faster responses, tracks user data with Google Analytics, and applies intelligent caching to improve performance, all in an intuitive and responsive design for a hassle-free booking experience.

weed.title: Weed Vision
weed.description: Weed Vision is a selective spraying system that uses computer vision to apply herbicides only to target plants, reducing field contamination by up to 80% and minimizing herbicide and fertilizer waste. This generates a positive environmental impact and financial savings, creating a mutual synergy between agriculture and the environment.
